segments.text: Yeas , It is . Sewen Jes speaking . How can I help ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Actually , I'm calling to complain about your service . The computer I bought last week is faulty .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , I'm sorry to hear that , sir . What exactly is problem ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , easily , It doesn't work . It doesn't even start probably .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , dear ! I'll do whatever I can .
segments.speaker: S2
